djangotailoring.project¶

The core module of djangotailoring is project. There are several functions available that are used to load or locate resources defined for the whole of the djangotailoring application.

Functions¶

djangotailoring.project.getproject()¶
Return type:tailoring2.BaseProject instance
Returns:the current application’s tailoring2 Project instance.

This is based on the global djangotailoring settings. The project object is lazily loaded.

djangotailoring.project.getprojectroot()¶
Return type:a string
Returns:the absolute path to the current project’s root folder.
djangotailoring.project.getsubjectloader()¶
Return type:djangotailoring.subjects.SubjectLoader object
Returns:the current subject loader class as defined by settings.TAILORING2_SUBJECT_LOADER_CLASS.
djangotailoring.project.project_document_path(path)¶
Parameters:path (a string) – a project-relative file path
Return type:a string
Returns:the absolute path to the document path.
djangotailoring.project.project_tailoring_doc(path)¶
Parameters:path (a string) – a project-relative file path
Return type:a tailoring2 Document instance
Returns:the tailoring2 Document (an ElementTree) for the document at path.
